column4: Does anyone know of a decent encryption tool for ubuntu for encrypted a partition?
there's a bunch of encryption ways. I like encryption on file system level though because it allows to backup data
you can for example use the loopback device to encrypt
I like the comparison made by the encfs developer: http://arg0.net/wiki/encfs/intro2
I use encfs, it's very easy
encryption on device level requires some more effort
I havn't heard of this one before, thanks - will delve into the reading now, must admit as much as I've looked around, I havn't really found many useful articles
if you don't seek to hide all your mp3s from the RIAA, I'd suggest encfs :)
